name: DROP
title: drop.space
shortDescription: DROP is a simple file sharing platform designed to facilitate the transfer of large files, up to 10GB, between users. It is ideal for professionals and businesses needing to share large documents, videos, or datasets quickly and securely. An example use case is a video production company sharing raw footage with remote editors.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: WeTransfer
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers similar large file sharing capabilities.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Google Drive
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Provides integrated office tools and sharing.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Dropbox
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Widely used for file storage and sharing.
